actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Social Security Act to encourage States to provide funds for programs to enhance and expand school health services.
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to maternal health services

summary.text: Amends title V (Maternal and Child Health Services) of the Social Security Act to provide for an increase in funding for maternal and child health services block grants. Allows the use of such funding for programs to: (1) enhance and expand school health services; and (2) provide and promote integrated services for children.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Social Security Act to encourage States to provide funds for programs to enhance and expand school health services.
